Html: Hello all, I'm currently trying to develop a source code to read an excel file in Windows Mobile 6.5 using VB.NET 2005 (Framework 2.0 Net.). I have add reference files like system.data, excel.dll from CodePlex. By the time we debug the errors are like this: File or Assembly name MissingMethodException 'System.Data, version 2.0.0.0 .... or one of its dependencies was not found'. please help your explain. Thanks.
